Services

Services

Some of what we do.

Business Intelligence

Reports, dashboards, charts, and graphs. If you need information from your systems then we can pull it. Specialties: PHP, MySQL, PostgreSQL.

Amazon Web Services

Moving your servers to the cloud? We can do that. We can handle all the networking, security, server setup, and databases. You just need to tell us when.

Linux

We can setup linux servers in a snap, and make existing one more secure. SSH, command line, bash, and cron? Check.

About

We are a small business intelligence company located in Lindon Utah. We love to work hard and play hard. When we aren't making meaning in the world you can find us mountain biking, hiking, fixing, and even doing yoga.

Most of all, we love solving hard problems and making your life easier.

VBA.net

Created a custom script to assist accounting. Used vba to repair errors on an excel sheet. Also changed formatting and output a csv. This saved their reporting team 5 hours of work per month.

  • Client: Middlebury Interactive Languages
  • Date: March 2014
  • Service: vba.net scripting

Automated Reporting Tool

The support team for an education company would manually run reports, attach them, and email them to the schools. We built an automated reporting tool to do the task for them, and saved 200 people hours per year. This increased the effectiveness of the support team, and gave the schools greater transparency.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Web Development - PHP, MySQL, and Linux
